vehicles.description: On the right side, adjacent to our car, there is a partially visible red vehicle with its front end facing left, indicating that it may be parked or preparing to depart.
vehicles.explanation: The vehicle may enter the roadway, requiring this car to slow down or change lanes to avoid collision. Additionally, it should be noted that the vehicle is currently stationary, but it may begin to move.

other objects.description: A green trash can was placed on the sidewalk to the right side of the main vehicle.
other objects.explanation: This object will not directly affect driving behavior, as it is neither on the road nor in a position that represents a danger.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the observed traffic image, there is one vehicle and an other object of interest. The vehicle in question is positioned on the right side, adjacent to our car, and is partially visible. It is red and its front end is facing to the left. The implication is that the vehicle could either be parked or preparing to depart. As an autonomous car, we should be cautious around this vehicle, as it may enter the roadway; thus, it would be prudent to slow down or change lanes to preemptively avoid a potential collision, taking into account the vehicle's current stationary state but considering the possibility that it might commence movement.

Additionally, there is a green trash can placed on the sidewalk to the right side of the main vehicle. This object does not have any direct impact on driving behavior, as it is not on the road nor in a position to pose any threat to vehicular safety.

driving_suggestion: Maintain a vigilant speed in your vehicle, be prepared for the possibility of the red vehicle on the right entering the roadway, and keep a safe distance from parked or idling vehicles. Pay attention to the red car parked on the right to prevent it from moving into the traffic lane, and drive carefully due to another vehicle approaching and the road possibly being slippery. Reduce speed to accommodate for the wet road surface, and anticipate needing a longer braking distance. Continue to drive with awareness of traffic regulations, road conditions, and the overall situation.

1.description and explanation: This image shows the rear side of a vehicle, most likely its trunk and part of the rear windshield. The red color is distinctive, indicating it's the body of the car. The ego car must maintain a safe following distance from this vehicle to anticipate any sudden stops or turns it might make. Keeping a proper distance will ensure the safety of all vehicles involved and allow for sufficient reaction time in case the lead vehicle decelerates or changes direction.
